comment: He is my senior labmate. Very honest and funny person. I like his behaviour and fun things and chit chats we do in our lab. We also go roam around the campus together sometimes. His memory is very sharp. I like his honest behaviour and him being a good human. Cheers!
name: Anand Kachale
